transArray.content: The environment is very good and the service attitude is very good!

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting! Our hotel is Hanting version 2.7, with novel decoration and complete facilities. Although the epidemic is now over, all areas of the hotel are still operated in accordance with strict disinfection procedures, so that you can stay at ease. The hotel has also added delivery robots and self-service laundry Room, dryer, tea bar and reading area provide you with a leisure and comfortable environment in your spare time. The hotel is also 1.2 kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, which can be reached in 15 minutes on foot. It is very convenient. We look forward to your visit again and wish you the best. Happy life!
